pr_title: Add ability to configure impersonating mitm

timeline.message:
Add ability to configure impersonating mitm
- proxy.mitm.enabled - enable mitm, default value is false
- proxy.mitm.key-store - path to PKCS12 keystore
- proxy.mitm.alias - alias of certificate in PKCS12 keystore
- proxy.mitm.password - password from PKCS12 keystore

Add ability to configure impersonating mitm
- proxy.mitm.enabled - enable mitm, default value is false
- proxy.mitm.key-store - path to PKCS12 keystore
- proxy.mitm.alias - alias of certificate in PKCS12 keystore
- proxy.mitm.password - password from PKCS12 keystore

timeline.author: ikalinin1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -36,8 +36,20 @@
 
     <bean id="proxy" class="org.vividus.proxy.ThreadedProxy" />
 
+    <bean id="mitmManagerFactory" class="org.vividus.proxy.mitm.MitmManagerFactory" />
+
+    <bean id="mitmManagerOptions" class="org.vividus.proxy.mitm.MitmManagerOptions" >
+        <constructor-arg index="0" value="${proxy.mitm.key-store:#{null}}" />
